topic: Understanding ADMTc: An Introduction to the Concept

message.content: ADMTC is an agency that acts as a service provider for educational services, representing the certifying organization at a national level for all partner centers. Its mission includes supporting partner centers in implementing training for certification, coordinating the organization of assessments, and ensuring compliance with the rules governing certification and its preparation.
